title: The Eating feel good movie
brief_description: In this film, food becomes a visual delight and eating is seen as fun. The film aims to develop understanding of the body’s needs for different kinds of foods and how basic foods are used by the body. This film attempts to make children aware of the advantages of eating the correct foods.
